context_bundle.summary: Installer fallback chain: Auto → mcpb → dxt → Manual

onboarding.quick_start: Try automated methods first, fall back gracefully to manual

fallback_chain.2_mcpb: Try MCP Builder if available (npm tool)
fallback_chain.3_dxt: Try Desktop Extension installer if available
fallback_chain.4_manual: Direct file operations as last resort

implementation.always_verify: After any method, verify installation worked
